TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonMenu implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示功能区选项卡或 Microsoft Office 菜单上的菜单。

span.span: Represents a menu on a Ribbon tab or on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Visual Studio 将创建对象在拖动时**菜单**控件从**Office 功能区控件**选项卡**工具箱**到功能区设计器上。Visual Studio creates a object when you drag a **Menu** control from the **Office Ribbon Controls** tab of the **Toolbox** onto the Ribbon Designer. 您可以创建在运行时通过使用方法的对象。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. ## 常规任务Common Tasks 下表列出了可用于常见任务的成员。The following table lists members that are useful for common tasks. 可以在设计时执行所有这些任务。All of these tasks can be performed at design time. 可以在运行时只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，或者该控件添加到动态菜单之前执行其中一些任务。Some of these tasks can be performed at run time only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application or before the control is added to a dynamic menu at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). |任务Task|成员Member| |----------|------------| |在菜单上显示的图像。Display an image on the menu.|使用或属性。Use the or property.

也可以重复使用内置功能区控件中显示的图像。You can also reuse images that appear in built-in Ribbon controls. 若要执行此操作，设置为你想要显示为菜单的图标的内置 Microsoft Office 映像的 ID。To do this, set to the ID of a built-in Microsoft Office image that you want to display as the icon for the menu.| |更改菜单的大小。Change the size of the menu.|设置属性设置为所需的值。Set the property to the value you want. 例如，对于大型的菜单中，将其设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。For example, for a large menu, set it to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.| |更改菜单中项的大小。Change the size of items in the menu.|设置属性设置为所需的值。Set the property to the value you want. 例如，若要显示较大的项，将其设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。For example, to display larger items, set it to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.| |在运行时 （例如，若要使控件能够在运行时添加到菜单） 启用对菜单上的更改。Enable changes to the menu at run time (for example, to enable controls to be added to the menu at run time).|将 属性设置为 `true`。Set the property to `true`.| |访问的菜单中的控件、 将控件添加到菜单中，或从菜单中删除控件。Access the controls in the menu, add controls to the menu, or remove controls from the menu.|使用 属性。Use the property.| |将菜单添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单、 组或另一个可以包含菜单的控件。Add a menu to the Microsoft Office Menu, a group, or to another control that can contain menus.|添加到`Items`的 Microsoft Office 菜单、 组或控件的属性。Add a to the `Items` property of the Microsoft Office Menu, group, or control.| [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加和在运行时填充到现有菜单子菜单。The following example demonstrates how to add and populate a sub-menu to an existing menu at run time. 更新在运行时的控件，并涉及到从使用语言集成查询 (LINQ) 的 AdventureWorks 示例数据库中获取数据的更丰富示例，请参阅[演练： 在运行时功能区上的控件](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-updating-the-controls-on-a-ribbon-at-run-time.md)。For a richer example that updates controls at run-time and involves getting data from the AdventureWorks sample database using Language-Integrated Queries (LINQ), see [Walkthrough: Updating the Controls on a Ribbon at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-updating-the-controls-on-a-ribbon-at-run-time.md). 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 到 Office 项目的项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组添加一个菜单。Add a menu to the group. 4. 设置 **（名称）** 属性的 menu 的`CustomerMenu`。Set the **(Name)** property of the menu to `CustomerMenu`. 5. 设置**标签**属性的到菜单上**客户**。Set the **Label** property of the menu to **Customers**. 6. 设置**动态**属性的 menu 的`true`。Set the **Dynamic** property of the menu to `true`. 这样，在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序中之后，就可以在运行时添加和删除菜单上的控件。This enables you to add and remove controls on the menu at run time after the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#14](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#14](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#14)]

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the menu.

value.span: 一个Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize ，表示菜单的大小。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果菜单嵌套在另一个菜单中，则此属性无效。This property has no effect if the menu is nested in another menu. 嵌套菜单的属性始终设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`。The property of a nested menu is always set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`. 若要使嵌套的菜单显示得更大，设置属性的父 menu 的`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。To make a nested menu appear larger, set the property of the parent menu to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前菜单上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on the current menu.

value.span: 在菜单上显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears on the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前菜单嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮，显示的说明和`ItemSize`的父菜单或拆分按钮的属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。The description appears when the current menu is nested in another menu or split button, and the `ItemSize` property of the parent menu or split button is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可在运行时修改菜单。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu can be modified at run time.

value.span: 如果可在运行时修改菜单，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the menu can be modified at run time; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为`true`如果想要在运行时，由 Microsoft Office 应用程序加载功能区后，会将控件添加到菜单。Set the property to `true` if you want to add controls to the menu at run time, after the Ribbon is loaded by the Microsoft Office application. 用于在设计时添加到功能区菜单只能在功能区加载之前，可以设置属性。For menus that you add to the Ribbon at design time, the property can be set only before the Ribbon loads. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置在菜单上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the menu.

value.span: 一个在菜单上显示的 。

span.span: An that is displayed on the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，该控件的外观被更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置属性，则和属性将被忽略。If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性可让您更好地控制比其他两个属性，这一点可以是速度较慢，因为每次更新控件时，图像对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识菜单的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the menu.

value.span: 一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识菜单的图像。

span.span: The name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序此映像从你的解决方案只检索一次，以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 此属性可以设置只能在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载过程事件。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 时将引发一次每个映像名称显示在功能区。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后，不能使用此属性更改控件图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像，将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性并设置属性的到想要加载的图像的对象。Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果忽略此属性属性或属性设置。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以稍快于标识的图像加载显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序中检索映像解决方案仅在首次从功能区。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取菜单上的控件的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of controls that are on the menu.

value.span: 菜单上的控件的集合。

span.span: The collection of controls that are on the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在运行时添加到菜单的功能区控件，创建控件的实例，然后将新控件添加到集合。To add a Ribbon control to a menu at run time, create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the collection. 如果你想要执行此操作在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之后，必须设置属性设置为`true`。If you want to do this after the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application, you must set the property to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 使用功能区设计器将控件添加到菜单在 Visual Studio 会自动添加到控件菜单的属性。When you add controls to a menu by using the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio automatically adds the controls to the property of the menu.

exception.span: 加载功能区后，可尝试在此集合中添加、移除或替换 。

span.span: You try to add, remove, or replace a to this collection after the Ribbon is loaded.

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单上控件的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the controls on the menu.

value.span: 一个Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize ，表示菜单上控件的大小。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the controls on the menu.

value.span: 默认值是Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular。

span.span: The default is Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要放大菜单上的控件，设置属性的父 menu 的`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。To enlarge controls that are on the menu, set the property of the parent menu to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 若要更改菜单的大小，请使用属性。To change the size of the menu, use the property.

summary.span: 在运行时将控件或嵌套菜单加载到当前菜单中时发生。

span.span: Occurs when controls or nested menus are loaded into the current menu at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发此事件是第一次在用户展开菜单。This event is raised the first time the user expands the menu. 如果在运行时修改菜单中的控件，这也会引发事件第一次将控件添加或移除的控件后，在用户展开菜单。If you modify the controls in the menu at run time, this event is also raised the first time the user expands the menu after you add a control or remove a control. 引发此事件时，才属性是`true`。This event is raised only when the property is `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单的键盘访问键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard access key of the menu.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示菜单的键盘访问键。

span.span: A string that represents the keyboard access key of the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Keytip 必须包含 1 到 3 个字符，不能包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 所有字符应都为大写。All characters should be upper case. Keytip 有时也称为访问密钥或加速器和用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，你的快捷键提示与键提示冲突，Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配非冲突快捷键提示值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单所显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed by the menu.

value.span: 菜单所显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed by the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要隐藏标签，设置属性设置为`false`。To hide the label, set the property to `false`.

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在菜单上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the menu, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此菜单图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识的控件显示 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，该控件的外观被更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关一系列`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果忽略此属性属性设置。This property is ignored if the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以稍快于标识的图像加载属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配给一个菜单。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a menu. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 到 Office 项目的项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组添加一个菜单。Add a menu to the group. 4. 设置**动态**属性的 menu 的`true`。Set the **Dynamic** property of the menu to `true`. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单的位置（如果该菜单在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the menu, if the menu is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示菜单的位置（如果该菜单在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the menu, if the menu is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 属性时菜单放置在功能区选项卡上没有任何作用。The property has no effect when the menu is placed on a Ribbon tab.

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到菜单上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the menu.

value.span: 用户将指针移到菜单上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 当设置属性，则值将显示的标题为。When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与菜单关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the menu is visible.

value.span: 如果与该菜单关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the menu is visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性自动设置为`true`如果您设置， ，或在设计时属性。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property at design time. 此属性自动设置为`true`如果您设置属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`在设计时或运行的时。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge` at design time or run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示菜单的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for the menu is visible.

value.span: 如果菜单的标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label for the menu is visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性始终为`true`如果您设置属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。This property is always `true` if you set the property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到菜单上时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the menu.

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 下显示文本。The appears under text. 与不同，则启用换行符的字符串中。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题，此标题在用户展开添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的菜单时显示。

span.span: Gets or sets the title that is displayed when the user expands a menu that is added to the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 此标题在用户展开添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的菜单时显示。

span.span: The title that is displayed when the user expands a menu that is added to the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该菜单在功能区选项卡上，则此属性无效。This property has no effect if the menu is on a Ribbon tab.
